Class SystemApp

java.lang.Object
objects.SystemApp
public class SystemApp extends Object
SystemApp class Main controller of the application

      public InetAddress getMyIp() throws SocketException, UnknownHostException, OsNotSupportedException

      the IP address
      Throws:
      SocketException - if the socket is not valid
